infotexts.faction.thal_ues.description: 欧罗巴联盟是一个主要由欧罗巴的研究人员，医生和其他受过良好教育的居民组成的组织。 他们的主要目标是与饥荒和贫困作斗争，以争取中下阶层的幸福。 结果，欧罗巴联盟的目的还在于阻止欧洲联盟与欧洲联盟之间正在进行的战争，因为他们认为欧洲联盟与世界各地的哨所都已肆虐。 向欧罗巴联盟捐款会使前哨站更容易接受。
infotexts.faction.thal_ues.shortdescription: 一个慈善的和平主义者组织，其宗旨是为了消除贫困，并为了人类的福祉而制止欧罗巴的大多数冲突。 向欧罗巴联盟的捐赠可以帮助欧罗巴的所有人。
infotexts.faction.thal_confederacy.description: 欧洲联盟是臭名昭著的木星分离主义者的分支。 大萧条过后，各个哨所联合起来倡导更加自由，这促使向欧罗巴联盟宣战。木星分离主义者和欧洲联盟分歧：木星分离主义者使用恐怖袭击来打击欧罗巴联盟，但欧洲联盟通常不会伤害欧罗巴联盟的无辜者。
infotexts.faction.thal_confederacy.shortdescriptio: 欧洲联盟正式宣布脱离欧罗巴联盟，将欧罗巴联盟称为叛徒。 但他们坚决拥护个人权利，因此他们与叛乱的木星分离主义者进行直接战争。
infotexts.faction.thal_cartel: 克托尼亚贩毒垄断联盟
infotexts.faction.thal_cartel.description: 在即将来临死亡的欧罗巴，强大的克托尼亚联盟满足酒精成瘾的欧罗巴人对毒品的需求。 尚不清楚克托尼亚指的是木星的岩石表面，还是指洛夫克拉夫特创作的钻地魔虫，或是指以垄断联盟为名的“黑社会”。 在某些缺乏适当法律和秩序的地区，垄断联盟由于其强大的权力而充当政府。
infotexts.faction.thal_cartel.shortdescription: 平均压力很大的欧罗巴需要救济，最好是毒品救济，从而在克托尼亚联盟存在的地区获得支持。
infotexts.jobdescription.thal_clown: 小丑是用来招待船员的可笑的怪兽。 他们的工作不是一定要帮助船，而是要通过无害的滑稽动作和恶作剧来帮助船员解决无聊。如果您的游戏在社交方面有点无聊，请考虑使用其中一种小丑游戏。
infotexts.jobdescription.thal_clown1: 小丑是经典的表演者，总是诡计多端。他们可以利用他们在船上发现的零散来制造各种恶作剧装备来捣乱。 还有，他们对气球非常熟练，可以制作出特殊的功能性气球。
infotexts.jobdescription.thal_clown2: 面具小丑，既是邪教徒又是萨满巫师，是小丑圣母的狡猾追随者。 他们宣誓就职于小丑圣母，是小丑戏法忠诚的奉献者。 如果有对精神仪式，鲜血契约和生物召唤的乐趣，请选择此职业。
infotexts.jobdescription.thal_clown3: 哑剧小丑无法说话，但拥有各种超能力，可以使它们更快，更硬，更结实，并能够影响/刺激其他玩家。
infotexts.jobdescription.thal_scientist: 渴望参加实验的人和想研究欧罗巴因素的研究人员属于科学家。 生长致命但有利可图的动物，创造活性气体，研究和剪接DNA，组装辉光剑，进行手术等等。
infotexts.jobdescription.thal_scientist1: 植物学家听起来似乎很无聊，但他们会让欧罗巴的花园变成植物恐怖的地狱。 植物的种类繁多，从高腐蚀性到高传染性，有时甚至还会造成死亡。 这项工作需要你系好呼吸器，来创造和维持剧毒环境，用以迅速致富。
infotexts.jobdescription.thal_scientist2: 对于那些拥有复杂DNA的家伙，遗传学家可以在DNA上与受试者”玩耍”。 囚禁怪物并扫描它们的DNA，然后可以用DNA孵化更多的怪物，也可以升级对付它们的武器，甚至将其DNA与你的队友嫁接以窃取其能力。
infotexts.jobdescription.thal_enforcer: Enforcers are responsible for keeping the submarine safe from threats, both external and internal. The creatures inhabiting the ocean aren't the only threat they need to worry about, as several of the renegade groups opposing the Europa Coalition are known to have sent infiltrators on board the vessels.
infotexts.hirecrew.cost: Hello, we're in need of a new crew. What are your prices?
infotexts.hirecrew.costre: Hello, I have a limited selection of crew members waiting for you.
infotexts.hirecrew.purchase: Thank you for your purchase; your crew member is waiting for your command.
infotexts.hirecrew.nohc: No, we're currently not looking to hire anyone.
infotexts.hirecrew.nohcre: Understood, I'll be here if you happen to change your mind.
infotexts.hirecrew.rehc: Hey there! Have you changed your mind?
infotexts.hirecrew.rehc_yes: Yes, who is available for recruitment?
infotexts.thal_ues_donate.accept: You press the donation button and the screen shows an animated sub shooting off fireworks.
infotexts.thal_ues_donate.info: You check the terminal and it says"United Europa Society needs every mark, would you care to donate?"
infotexts.afflictiondescription.thal_nutrition: The patient's body is benefitting from the nutrition of a previous meal. Natural regenerative processes of cells are sped up, and buffs circulate in the bloodstream for longer. These effects become more pronounced the more nutrition there is. Healthy food has a better nutrition to fillingness ratio.
infotexts.afflictiondescription.thal_foodpoisoning: The patient reports extreme discomfort in their abdomen, likely stemming from eating infected or unclean food. It is harder for them to walk, and nutrition from all food is wasted fighting the malignant bacteria in the stomach.
infotexts.selfcauseofdeathdescription.thal_foodpoi: You have died of food poisoning.
infotexts.afflictiondescription.thal_glowing: A scalding hot and putrid smelling fluid covers and soaks into the patient's skin. The patient does not seem to be affected by any kind of heat, but may be a hazard to those around them.
infotexts.selfcauseofdeathdescription.thal_glowing: You have decayed due to the Glow
infotexts.afflictiondescription.thal_frozen: The patient's skin is extremely cold to the touch. There are patches of frostbitten skin over the affected area.
infotexts.afflictiondescription.thal_silenced: The patient's tongue is tied, but it is slowly untying. They should be able to talk without treatment in some time.
infotexts.causeofdeathdescription.thal_silenced: this guy/gal shut the fuck up somehow you shouldn't see this
infotexts.selfcauseofdeathdescription.thal_silence: You have shut the fuck up.
infotexts.afflictiondescription.thal_bombcollar: The patient's neck has been reduced to a few crisp tendons and bone, likely resulting from a bomb collar.
infotexts.selfcauseofdeathdescription.thal_bombcol: You have died as a result of your attempt to remove the explosive collar.
infotexts.afflictiondescription.thal_bombcollartim: The patient's neck has been reduced to a few crisp tendons and bone, likely resulting from a timed bomb collar.
infotexts.causeofdeathdescription.thal_bombcollart: Failed to disarm explosive collar in time.
infotexts.selfcauseofdeathdescription.thal_bombcol: You have died as a result of your inability to disarm the collar in time.
infotexts.selfcauseofdeathdescription.thal_gutted: You have died from having your muscles carved out of you.
infotexts.afflictiondescription.thal_fallen: The patient has fallen and cannot get up. Give them a second.
infotexts.afflictiondescription.thal_mushroomized: A large fuchsia mushroom sprouts from the patient's head, inversing their motor functions. When the affliction reaches its peak, it will turn into a Ramblin' Evil Mushroom to further spread the mushroomization.
infotexts.afflictiondescription.thal_blinded: The patient's eyes and nasal passages are swollen and cannot stop watering.
infotexts.afflictiondescription.thal_teargasafflic: The patient has been exposed to tear gas.
infotexts.selfcauseofdeathdescription.thal_teargas: You died to Tear Gas Exposure
infotexts.afflictiondescription.thal_shroomcureaff: The patient has been exposed to aerosol fungicide.
infotexts.afflictiondescription.thal_blackholedeat: The patient has been exposed to tear gas.
infotexts.selfcauseofdeathdescription.thal_blackho: You have been spaghettified by a black hole.
infotexts.afflictiondescription.thal_chance: Extra borrowed time granted by your phoenix injector. It won't last forever: find medicine ASAP!
infotexts.thalcampaign_start.1: Welcome to Thalassophobia's Campaign. Before you begin, you will select your background with your crew, which will affect your starting reputation.
infotexts.thalcampaign_start.2: Decide with your crew on a background that seems fun or fitting for you.
infotexts.thalcampaign_start.newline: We are NEW ARRIVALS on Europa. Fate will forge a name for us.
infotexts.thalcampaign_newbrief: You are new arrivals on Europa. The world of Barotrauma is new and interesting. You start with no perks. No faction hates you, but no faction is fond of you. As the campaign progresses, you will be presented with the opportunity to join and leave factions as you please like any other background preset. You are your own man/woman. Choose this route to start with a clean slate, like in Vanilla Barotrauma.
infotexts.thalcampaign_start.corporateline: We are ELITE CORPORATE AGENTS. Our loyalty lies in COALITION INTERESTS.
infotexts.thalcampaign_corporatebrief: You work for CATPOL, a terrorist hunting law enforcement agency. You have special access to some of the newest high-grade gear on Europa. If you stray too far from Coalition interests though, prepare to face consequences. Choose this route to play as the heavy-handed arm of the law.
infotexts.thalcampaign_start.circusline: We are A TRAVELLING CIRCUS. A carnival of chaos will swallow Europa whole.
infotexts.thalcampaign_circusbrief: Clown ships go from outpost to outpost, harassing their denizens with chaotic clown antics. Clown crews will have access to ridiculous dialogue options that may result in almost spontaneous outcomes, with a large emphasis placed on RNG. Nobody is safe! This route just wants to watch the world burn.
infotexts.thalcampaign_start.huskline: We are CALYX MISSIONARIES. The teachings of the husk will save humankind.
infotexts.thalcampaign_huskbrief: Humanity must seek salvation from the eggs, evolving us to adapt to life on Europa. Your assignment from the high priest is to spread the influence of the husk. Along the way, clergymen will aid you from the shadows to make sure no human goes unchanged. Choose this route to take part in a transhumanism conspiracy.
infotexts.thalcampaign_start.bluecollarline: We are A FOR-HIRE LOWLIVES. Underworld connections find us illegal work.
infotexts.thalcampaign_bluecollarbrief: On Europa, you're nobody until you're "in the game". As a street crew, you do it all for the marks, no questions asked. Hit job? Easy street. Narcotic smuggling? Piece of cake. You don't have a "home base"; The streets are where you were born and raised. Choose this route to experience the sprawling criminal underworld and the low life of Europa.
infotexts.thalcampaign_start.terroristline: We are RESISTANCE INSURGENTS. Smash the fascist state and free the moon.
infotexts.thalcampaign_terroristbrief: For years, the people of Europa have suffered under the tyrannical rule of the all-encompassing Coalition. The surveillance, the police brutality, the rampant corruption; All while Coalition fat cats live it up in luxury stations. Enough is enough. Choose this route to smash the state and stick it to the man.
infotexts.thalcampaign_uesdonation.start: A doctor approaches you, holding some kind of box decorated with a mark sign. “Excuse me, I'm a fundraiser with the UES... Would it be too much to ask for just a moment of your time?“
infotexts.thalcampaign_uesdonation.lore: The fundraiser pauses and looks at you quizzically. “I'm surprised you've never heard of us. We're a charitable, nonprofit organization dedicated to improving the quality of life on Europa. You ever notice how everywhere you go in these outposts, you see maniac clowns, lowlives, mudraptors in vents... the like? The UES believes that Europa doesn't have to be like this; Our fundraising aims to increase the quality of life in outposts.“
infotexts.thalcampaign_uesdonation.fewmarks: They continue: “We mostly fight poverty by managing soup kitchens, clothing drives, or doing community service like cleaning up the outposts hit hard by the crash.“ They present the donation box: “Just a few marks can make a world of difference!“
infotexts.thalcampaign_uesdonation.goingaround: “And you're going around with that thing asking for donations?“
infotexts.thalcampaign_uesdonation.donationoptions: They eagerly hold up the donation box. “Would you like to make a contribution?“
infotexts.thalcampaign_uesdonation.react10: You transfer 10 Marks to the UES. “Thanks, we greatly appreciate it.“
infotexts.thalcampaign_uesdonation.react100: You transfer 100 Marks to the UES. “Wow, 100 marks! This will help greatly. Thank you sincerely.“
infotexts.thalcampaign_uesdonation.react1000: You transfer 1000 Marks to the UES. They look flabbergasted. “You're serious? I can't thank you enough... this is incredible! Thank you so, so much. We won't forget this.“
infotexts.thalcampaign_uesdonation.mug: [Armed] “How about you make a contribution to me instead?“
infotexts.thalcampaign_uesdonation.mugsuccess: They back away, astonished. “Y-You know this is a one-way transfer device, right? ...You know what, forget it! Here: You can have 400 Marks, it's all I have in my personal account, I swear. Just don't hurt me!“ They give you the marks and back off. The UES will hear about this.
infotexts.thalcampaign_uesdonation.mugfail: They back away, astonished. “Who the hell do you think you are, stealing from charity? You low-down piece of crawler shit!" Their hand dives into their jacket. Get ready to fight!
infotexts.thalcampaign_uesdonation.hippies: “Aren't you guys a bunch of hippies?“
infotexts.thalcampaign_uesdonation.irked: The UES member is clearly irked by your remark: “We oppose the conflict between the coalition and the separatist forces, if that's what you mean. It's our belief the 'war on terrorism' has done nothing but make a lot of marks for weapon manufacturers, all at the cost of the common people. There was never a 'good war' or a 'bad peace'. Regardless, none of our fundraising is spent politically. We just want to ease suffering.“
infotexts.thalcampaign_uesdonation.political: “So you're backed by the Coalition, or what?“
infotexts.thalcampaign_uesdonation.humanity: The UES member gives a sidelong look: “We're not really 'with' anyone. The UES is friends to humanity itself. Is it really so bad that we're not power-tripping oligarchs, murderous separatists, parasite-worshipping cultists, or psycho clowns? Some people say that unlike the other guys, our pacifist ideals aren't achievable on the hellscape that is Europa. I guess after this fundraising campaign, we'll see how many people are willing to believe.“
infotexts.thalcampaign_uesdonation.membership: The fundraiser smiles. “Well, I'm not really a recruiter. I've been penned in this middle-of-nowhere outpost on fundraising duty until... pretty much the end of time, so I don't have the paperwork on me. I'll forward your request to higher-ups though, and we'll see if someone can contact you further into your travels at a different outpost, okay?“
infotexts.thalcampaign_uesdonation.iknow: “I know who you are. Are you looking for a donation?“
infotexts.thalcampaign_uesdonation.keepwalking: Keep on walking and avert your gaze.
infotexts.thalcampaign_uesdonation.busy: “I'm sorry, I'm really quite busy right now.“
infotexts.thalcampaign_uesdonation.terrorinquiry: [CATPOL Agent] “Actually, I need a moment of *your* time. Have you been witness to any suspected conspiracy against the Coalition?“
infotexts.thalcampaign_uesdonation.catpol: [CATPOL Agent] “A UES flower boy, huh? Give me all of today's funds raised, and I'll pretend I didn't catch you panhandling without a Coalition Permit.“
infotexts.thalcampaign_uesdonation.blackmail: The UES fundraiser is furious. “Shithead CATs like you are why we can't have nice things. I hope you and all your Coalition buddies get what's coming to you.“ They begrudgingly give you 300 Marks and walk away.
infotexts.thalcampaign_mimeperformance.start: There's a street mime here. These professional entertainers engage in what many believe to be more sophisticated acts of tomfoolery. While clowns engage in crass, lowbrow humor, mimes are naturally drawn to better-bred antics, making them more accepted in many outposts, regardless of creed.
infotexts.thalcampaign_mimeperformance.grin: The mime swivels around and sees you. They exaggeratedly lean forward to peer at you, hand shielding their eyes from an imaginary sun. A moment later, their pale face breaks into a big, checkered grin. Your crew's reputation precedes you among many European entertainers, and this one seems to have heard good things about the whole lot.
infotexts.thalcampaign_mimeperformance.enjoy: Tastefully enjoy a delightful show of expressive gesture.
infotexts.locationchange.thal_mineRadioactive.chan: A new outpost has been established at [previousname], formerly a nuclear mine.
A new military outpost has been established at [previousname], formerly a nuclear mine.
A new research outpost has been established at [previousname], formerly a nuclear mine.
infotexts.locationchange.thal_blackSite.changeto.o: [previousname] has been converted to an outpost after a security breach jeopardized operational security.
infotexts.locationchange.thal_blackSite.changeto.m: A new military outpost has been established at [previousname], formerly a classified site.
infotexts.locationchange.thal_blackSite.changeto.r: A new research outpost has been established at [previousname], formerly a classified site.
infotexts.entitydescription.thal_sprinkler: 向区域喷水以扑灭大火或给水生植物浇水。 使其长时间运行可能会引起水坑。 或更糟。
infotexts.entitydescription.thal_trashcan: 垃圾桶可用于处理中小型物品。 将trigger_out连接到垃圾斜槽，然后将斜槽连接到要运输物品的罐子上。
infotexts.entitydescription.thal_blastdoor: 速度慢，装甲重的滑动门，无法被怪物撬开或切碎。 没有按钮版本。
infotexts.entitydescription.thal_glassdoor: 比普通门稍弱，完全透明的门完全由有机玻璃基超材料制成。
infotexts.entitydescription.thal_glassdoorwbuttons: 比普通门稍弱，完全透明的门完全由有机玻璃基超材料制成。 具有集成的按钮。
infotexts.entitydescription.thal_glasshatch: 比普通门稍弱，完全透明的舱口，完全由基于有机玻璃的超材料制成。
infotexts.entityname.thal_glasshatchwbuttons: 带按钮的有机玻璃舱口盖
infotexts.entitydescription.thal_glasshatchwbutton: 比普通门稍弱，完全透明的舱口，完全由基于有机玻璃的超材料制成。 具有集成的按钮。
infotexts.entitydescription.thal_oxygendock: 能够容纳三个氧气罐或焊接罐的补充坞。 只要氧气还在流动，就可以与氧气发生器连接以重新填充任何包含在内的氧气罐。 仅具有发泄标签以实现前哨站兼容性； 不会向船体释放氧气。
infotexts.entitydescription.thal_shuttervent: 可以通过配线或扳手打开/关闭氧气流的通风口。 也可以用扳手将物品存放在其中，尽管锐利的眼睛会注意到突出的盖子。
infotexts.entitydescription.thal_vacuum: 机器，在正确供电和启动后能够将氧气抽出房间。 是解决火灾和窒息活物的理想选择。
infotexts.entitydescription.thal_vendingmachine: 分配放置在其中的任何东西。 需要撬棍才能打开，并且要花钱才能重新装满。
infotexts.entitydescription.thal_sheetmusic: A sheet of music made by an unknown individual, hopefully they are still with us producing music.
infotexts.entitydescription.thal_thalamuseye: 丘脑之眼，环顾四周并发出柔软的声音。 可以被摧毁。
infotexts.entitydescription.thal_thalamusseeds: 丘脑种子。 不能互动。 看起来像牙齿。
infotexts.entitydescription.thal_headsetchannel: 多声道耳机。 输入数字以更改频道。
infotexts.entitydescription.thal_rainbowsprayer: 一种经过改进的喷涂机，设计用于以更鲜艳的色彩进行绘画。 以红，绿，蓝，透明度格式输入颜色（范围为0到255）。 需要使用其他涂料制成的涂漆。
infotexts.entitydescription.thal_sign: 用于显示文本的标准白色标志。 可以贴在墙上并用笔写字。 防水，但易燃。
infotexts.entitydescription.thal_multitool: 大规模生产的小刀被联盟发放给许多船只，每个人都可以使用。 带有可模仿螺丝刀，扳手的伸缩工具，并带有可折叠的刀片，专为与小型外星人战斗而设计。
infotexts.entitydescription.thal_map: 通用舱用地图，可扫描船体以检测船的布局以及船壳中的任何异常情况。 有用的地图和电池上的方便。
infotexts.entitydescription.thal_mapwater: 经过特殊设计的舱用地图PRO不仅可以扫描船体和相应的异常信息，还可以扫描船内的水。 专为为机械师而生产，但对希望修补和排水船只的人来说非常有用。
infotexts.entitydescription.thal_mapair: 经过特殊设计的Automap不仅可以扫描船体和破损，还可以扫描船内的氧气含量。 专为工程师使用而生产，但对想要检测电力和火或普遍缺氧的人员来说非常有用。
infotexts.entitydescription.thal_mapall: 先进的自动地图设计用于扫描船体，破损，水和氧气含量。 它的全能特性使它消耗电池比一般舱用地图更快。
infotexts.entitydescription.thal_foldingtable: 可以移动的钢制折叠桌。 玩家可以在上面放置物品。
infotexts.entitydescription.thal_attachablejunctio: A junction box that can be attached and detached from a wall. Useful for electricians managing or building a power grid.
infotexts.entitydescription.thal_dpbm: 一台弹奏和循环演奏乐器的机器。 按下按钮可以创造不超过9秒钟的鼓声音乐。它们会循环播放
infotexts.entitydescription.thal_shockmodule: 可以像按钮一样挂在墙上的有线模块。 激活后，将释放出惊人的电流。
infotexts.entitydescription.thal_pen: 一种便宜的防水塑料笔，背面有橡皮擦，可以擦掉墨水。 可以在备忘录和标志上写字，或刺伤他人。 通常只给队长用，以防止故意搞破坏。
infotexts.entitydescription.thal_memo: 可以用笔在小巧的备忘录上写字
infotexts.entitydescription.thal_memoboard: 用于包含备忘录的板。 玩家可以将鼠标悬停在便笺上以查看他们的发言。 从Barotrauma 0.10.5.0+版本开始，不要在巡回/子编辑器之间保存其内容。
infotexts.entitydescription.thal_breachcharge: 专用于粉碎门的高爆炸药。 将其安装在门旁边，进行设置，然后撤退。 探索废墟，残骸的理想选择。
infotexts.entitydescription.thal_hackeruplink: 只要你拥有材料，便可以使用便携式菜单生成r3n3g8目录中的项目。
infotexts.entitydescription.thal_powersink: r3n3g8设计的可插拔模块能够在接入电源时在电网上施加巨大的负载。适用于破坏设备，这些攻击很容易炸开路口并偶尔起火。
infotexts.entitydescription.thal_structnanogrenade: 使用纳米机器人的一次性爆破手榴弹，可以快速修复大部分船体。 适用于需要快速修复船体的紧急情况。
infotexts.entitydescription.thal_doorkey: r3n3g8设计的近场通信标签，旨在使门打开而无需等待撬棍。 仅可用于两种用途，请注意自动关闭门不能使用。
infotexts.entitydescription.thal_signaljammer: r3n3g8设计的短波频率轰炸机。 会轻易阻止机组人员之间的无线电通讯。 但是，干扰会随着距离的增加而增加，因此船员会知道使用者什么时候在附近。
infotexts.entitydescription.thal_discoball: Can be attached to the wall like any other light source.
infotexts.entitydescription.thal_streetsign: An ordinary sign with an improbable capacity for bloodshed.
infotexts.entitydescription.thal_whoopeecushion: 当被挤压时会发出讨人厌的声音的垫子。 可以像喇叭一样使用，也可以将其放在可踩踏的地板上。
infotexts.entitydescription.thal_confettigrenade: 看起来像是手榴弹，但只会释放纸屑。 适用于玩笑和一般性的恐吓。 好极了！
infotexts.entitydescription.thal_blindfold: 佩戴时会看不见。 对bot无效。
infotexts.entitydescription.thal_chaoshorn: 产生爆炸声，但不会爆炸，用途有限，而且可能会被警告。 砰！
infotexts.entitydescription.thal_muzzle: 呜呜呜，佩戴后不能说话
infotexts.entitydescription.thal_waterballoon: 一个气球，如果使用者在水中，可以装满水后扔掉。 还可以被小丑改造成梦幻般的特殊气球。
infotexts.entitydescription.thal_paintballoon: 这个可抛气球已充满油漆。 撞击时，肯定会变得一团糟。
infotexts.entitydescription.thal_bloodballoon: 这个可抛气球已充满血液。 撞击时，残留的脏物可能看起来像犯罪现场。
infotexts.entitydescription.thal_jokerevolver: 一种左轮手枪，发射旗帜而不发射子弹。 用于玩笑和恐吓。
infotexts.entitydescription.thal_bowlingball: 可以砸人，最好不要砸中脚
infotexts.entitydescription.thal_clownpack: 时尚的背包，上面有张有趣的脸。 背包会吸收冲击和子弹，因此是不错的选择。
infotexts.entitydescription.thal_wirebind: DIY Handcuffs made from wires. Will break after some time of being worn due to natural wear and tear.
infotexts.entitydescription.thal_clownkit: A clockwork fabricator used for creating mischievous prank items. While not exactly productive, the fabricator is generally harmless fun.
infotexts.entitydescription.thal_huskcostume: Costume that makes the wearer look like a husk. A great way to get shot.
infotexts.entitydescription.thal_candle: 装饰光源，在燃烧时会消耗蜡。 瞄准并按住左键单击一次可以让他燃烧。 会被水扑灭。
infotexts.entitydescription.thal_ouijaboard: 占卜板，可以与鬼神精神交流。 用于仪式。
infotexts.entitydescription.thal_paintbrush: Aim and use (like you would to attach) to put down a pentagram.
infotexts.entitydescription.thal_pentagram: A summoning pentagram for the usage of bringing living entities into the world. Cannot be removed once it is placed. Place certain key items within it and press initiate to begin.
infotexts.entitydescription.thal_cultistmask: Mask worn by cultists to show loyalty to the honkmother.
infotexts.entitydescription.thal_zombieknife: Ancient Shaman Voodoo knife. Stabbing a dead human body brings it back to “life“, and serves as a blood source for clowns.
infotexts.entitydescription.thal_restoreknife: Ancient Shaman Voodoo knife. Stabbing a dead human body brings it back to life, restoring their soul to their body.
infotexts.entitydescription.thal_cultistcostume: A costume frequently donned by the order. Said to be imbued with the screams of 1000 birthday rituals.
infotexts.entitydescription.thal_cultistknife: A disturbing dagger with a large gutter to collect blood from the living for sacrifices with altars.
infotexts.entitydescription.thal_cultistkit: An altar used for summoning items through blood ritual. Place your gutter dagger inside and select an option to summon an item, if you have the required blood.
infotexts.entitydescription.thal_carver: 砍肉刀反复击砍尸体会把尸体切成可加工的肉。 肉可以用作孵化生物。
infotexts.entitydescription.thal_mediumbrain: 新鲜，强壮的平均大小的大脑。 可以食用，加工，用于科学等等。
infotexts.entitydescription.thal_smallbrain: 新鲜，鲜亮的小脑。 可以食用，加工，用于科学等等。
infotexts.entitydescription.thal_largebrain: 新鲜，鲜亮的大脑。 可以食用，加工，用于科学等等。
infotexts.entitydescription.thal_smallbreast: 新鲜，鲜亮的乳房。 可以食用，加工，用于科学等等。
infotexts.entitydescription.thal_mediumbreast: A fresh, sanguineous sizeable pectoral muscle. Can be eaten, processed, used for science, and much more.
infotexts.entitydescription.thal_mediumthigh: A fresh, sanguineous sizeable quadricep muscle. Can be eaten, processed, used for science, and much more.
infotexts.entitydescription.thal_smallthigh: A fresh, sanguineous tiny quadricep muscle. Can be eaten, processed, used for science, and much more.
infotexts.entitydescription.thal_largethigh: A fresh, sanguineous colossal quadricep muscle. Can be eaten, processed, used for science, and much more.
infotexts.entitydescription.thal_foodcart: 便携式烹饪台。 可以根据配备的炊具来准备各种食物。
infotexts.entitydescription.thal_meatgrinder: 一种手持式绞肉机，可用于将更多易于处理的肉加工成绞肉。
一个能盛放大多数食物的大锅。 能够煮沸任何东西，提供一个烹饪台。
infotexts.entitydescription.thal_shroomseed: 气味奇特的种子被孢子覆盖，能够像其他任何植物一样种植。 会产生足够的酵母屑，使您富有，但可能释放出孢子。
infotexts.entitydescription.thal_shroomcure: 治愈蘑菇化。 具有与普通花萼不同的粘度。
infotexts.entitydescription.thal_zombieseed: 奇怪的冰冷种子。 会长出蛆虫茎，会长出蛆巢，可因盐水而孵出。 蛆虫会使死去的生物复活，所以要小心！
infotexts.entitydescription.thal_randomseed: This item is not meant to be seen. If you're a modder, you only need to edit that one item to make the seedmodder give your modded seeds.
infotexts.entitydescription.thal_rustseed: 有臭味的种子，生长成锈枯的植物。 该植物产生鸦片，但也释放出腐蚀性云雾，这些云可能会燃烧并穿过周围的墙壁并排出氧气。 要求维护速度较高的船种植。
infotexts.entitydescription.thal_wheatseed: 来自地球的小麦种子，经过基因改造，可以在水培条件下更快地生长。 制作面粉必不可少的。
infotexts.entitydescription.thal_clownseed: 会变成小丑植物的小丑种子。 该植物的生长有些不可预测，并且渗漏苏打水的趋势。
infotexts.entitydescription.thal_sugarcane: 来自地球的略带甜味的品尝植物，经过基因改造，可以在水培条件下更快地生长。 与许多植物不同，甘蔗是从自身而不是种子中生长的。
infotexts.entitydescription.thal_botanistsuit: 轻便的套装，设计用于处理挥发性菌群。 轻度抵抗灼伤和割伤。
infotexts.entitydescription.thal_botanistmask: 具有内置空气过滤系统的工业级口罩，主要用于抵抗植物产生的有毒烟雾影响。 充满氧气，就像潜水面罩一样。
infotexts.entitydescription.thal_fumigator: 改进的喷火器，可从装有任何气体的气瓶中排放气体。
infotexts.entitydescription.thal_assembler: 能够组装复杂设备的手持式原子制造机。 需要插入示意图和示意图说明中指定的材料。
infotexts.entitydescription.thal_constructor: 具有量子操纵功能的可附加组件，有以在极为复杂的3D打印机械中使用。
infotexts.entitydescription.thal_recipeconstructor: 包含用于组装通用构造器的制造说明的数据芯片，该装置能够创建允许进入科学高层的物品。\n插入到：原子制造机\nAlongside a: Titanium-Aluminum Bar
infotexts.entitydescription.thal_recipeplanter: 包含用于组装通用构造器的制造说明的数据芯片，该装置能够创建允许进入科学高层的物品。\n插入到：原子制造机\nAlongside a: Metal Crate
infotexts.entitydescription.thal_recipefumigator: 包含用于组装熏蒸器的制造说明的数据芯片，熏蒸器是一种能够喷射加压气体的设备。\n插入到：原子制造机\nAlongside a: Welding Tool
infotexts.entitydescription.thal_recipebotanistmas: 包含用于组装气雾呼吸器的制造说明的数据芯片，该设备能够滤除有毒气体。\n插入到：原子制造机\nAlongside a: Diving Mask
infotexts.entitydescription.thal_recipedischarger: 包含用于组装放电器（一种弱的可充电手枪）的制造说明的数据芯片。\n插入到：原子制造机\nAlongside a: Handheld Sonar
infotexts.entitydescription.thal_recipefungicide: 数据芯片包含用于组装气雾杀菌剂圆筒的制造说明，该圆筒是用于阻止蘑菇暴发的加压熏蒸机圆筒。\n插入到：原子制造机\nAlongside a: Ramblin Evil Seed
infotexts.entitydescription.thal_recipegeneticinit: Datachip containing Atomic Converter instructions for converting an Antirad into a CRISPR Cas-9 Solution.
infotexts.entitydescription.thal_recipegeneticgraf: Datachip containing Atomic Converter instructions for converting a Syringe Gun into a DNA Grafter.
infotexts.entitydescription.thal_cylinderspore: 包含气瓶的孢子的加压气瓶，给蘑菇用。 避免掉落。
infotexts.entitydescription.thal_cylinderlaughing: 加压气瓶中含有一氧化二氮，这是一种常见的气体，具有止痛作用，其作用是将氧气剥夺。 避免掉落。
infotexts.entitydescription.thal_cylinderfreeze: 装有液氮的加压气瓶，液氮是一种具有极低沸点的低温液体，能够快速冷冻活组织。
infotexts.entitydescription.thal_cylindershroomcur: 含有气化抗菌丝体的加压气瓶。 杀死蘑菇并为蘑菇化受害者消毒。
infotexts.entitydescription.thal_cylinderteargas: 含有2-氯苯甲基丙二腈的加压气瓶，经修饰可作为空气刺激性物质。 如果气体与眼睛接触，将导致短暂的刺激和失明。 自我防御时很有用。
infotexts.entitydescription.thal_hydrophonicsign: 可以放在地板上或附着在墙上的标志，以指示从爆炸的石榴到传染性孢子的植物危害区域。
infotexts.entitydescription.thal_botanistbook: 本书详细介绍了植物学家能够种植的各种农作物和植物。
infotexts.entitydescription.thal_discourager: 自控武器，可使用电击破坏神经系统。 会使生物丧失行走能力使其成为自卫的理想武器。
infotexts.entitydescription.thal_cultistbook: 本书详细介绍了邪教角色的基础知识。 按住以阅读，在最上方的栏中输入内容进行浏览。
infotexts.entitydescription.thal_singularity: 越来越多的人因可怕的引力反常现象被吸入其中。
infotexts.entitydescription.thal_secondchance: 固醇肾上腺素溶液会自动注射在重伤人员中。 在您的快捷栏时使用进行使用会暂时恢复精力，便于让你寻求医疗救助。
infotexts.entitydescription.thal_geneticinit: 使用DNA Cas9解决方案后，再使用DNA嫁接器植入DNA到测试者体内。长时间不制止DNA变异可能会造成灾难性的后果。 患者“崩溃”的时间越长，他们意外获得DNA遗传就越多。
infotexts.entitydescription.thal_geneticgraft: 可以将DNA样本放入其中的注射器。 CRISPR-Cas9解决方案注射到人体内后，再使用DNA嫁接器，才能进行DNA修改.
infotexts.entitydescription.thal_disordersave: Transfers genetic disorders or mutations, storing them for future use.
infotexts.afflictiondescription.thal_scan: The patient is being scanned or analyzed by a nearby scanner.
infotexts.self_causeofdeathdescription.thal_scan: you have fallen down and died somehow
infotexts.afflictiondescription.thal_apostleinfect: The patient is rapidly transforming into an apostle.
infotexts.self_causeofdeathdescription.thal_apostl: You have been reborn as an apostle.
infotexts.afflictiondescription.thal_maggotinfecti: The patient's skin ripples with thousands of tiny maggots underneath the epidermis, burrowing holes in necrotic tissue and gnawing at the nervous system.
infotexts.self_causeofdeathdescription.thal_maggot: You have been infested by maggots.
infotexts.afflictiondescription.thal_full: The patient's stomach is busy digesting food; At maximum affliction, they are full. When repletion reaches 100, they will be unable to consume any food. Notably separate from nutrition, which is beneficial.
infotexts.afflictiondescription.thal_mimeafflictio: The patient is a mime and has taken a miming oath. They cannot speak.
infotexts.causeofdeathdescription.thal_mimeafflict: The mime mistakenly tried to mimic a dead person.
infotexts.self_causeofdeathdescription.thal_mimeaf: You have died from being a mime(?).
infotexts.afflictiondescription.thal_diarrhea: The patient is experiencing extreme discomfort near their bowel region. Gas trapped in their intestines causes painful, loud, and unflattering happenings near the colon. It will go away with time, unless it is being caused by a separate factor (like a genetic disorder).
infotexts.afflictiondescription.thal_disordercurse: A genetic disorder. Your genetic meddling has distorted your natural humanity so horribly that you are an act against god. Just being alive gradually increases your crew's curse level. Can be cured by grafting uncorrupted human DNA.
infotexts.afflictiondescription.thal_disorderclown: A genetic allele that makes the patient gain resistances to stun while wearing a clown suit. When drunk on top of that, they gain regenerative abilities. \nCan be reverted by grafting uncorrupted human DNA.
infotexts.afflictiondescription.thal_disordercard:
A genetic allele. Holding a card belonging to a job in your direct inventory gives you a buff related to that job.
 Assistant: All skills increase gradually
Engineer: Burns heal over time.
 Mechanic: Speed increased.
 Clown: Being drunk gradually gives vigor.
 Medic: Immune to opiate withdrawl.
 Scientist: Any affliction considered "poison" reduced in strength or slowed.
 Security: Bleeding Reduced.
 Captain: Stun timer decreases more quickly.
infotexts.afflictiondescription.thal_disordersmart: A genetic allele that boosts all the patient's skills, making grinding to level up skills much more achieveable. \nCan be reverted by grafting uncorrupted human DNA.
infotexts.afflictiondescription.thal_disorderpoiso: A genetic allele. When the patient is at full health, the progression of most poisons and infections are reverted and held in their early stages until the patient's health drops below full, or the ailment is cured. Can be reverted by grafting uncorrupted human DNA.
infotexts.afflictiondescription.thal_disorderthres: A genetic allele that increases the effectiveness of the Thresher Torso genetic splice to withstand pressure at 10k meters underwater instead of the normal 5k. \nCan be reverted by grafting uncorrupted human DNA.
infotexts.afflictiondescription.thal_disordercrawl: A genetic allele that allows patients with the Crawler Head Splice to drink blood from corpses until they're sucked dry, and to be resistant to food poisoning. \nCan be reverted by grafting uncorrupted human DNA.
infotexts.afflictiondescription.thal_disordermudra: A genetic allele that allows patients with the Mudraptor Tail Splice to gain temporary pressure resistance in water, allowing for 30 seconds more time before being crushed. \nCan be reverted by grafting uncorrupted human DNA.
infotexts.afflictiondescription.thal_disorderhamme: A genetic allele that allows patients with the Hammerhead Head Splice to gain the ability to shoot laserbeams when attacking. \nCan be reverted by grafting uncorrupted human DNA.
infotexts.afflictiondescription.thal_disorderbapti: A genetic allele. Your genetic modification has effectively made you a new being; 'born again'. Submerging yourself in the holy water of Europa gradually washes away your crew's curse level. \nCan be reverted by grafting uncorrupted human DNA.
infotexts.afflictiondescription.thal_meltdown: The patient's cellular DNA is compromised. With cells unable to reproduce, the patient is slowly 'melting' into dead cells. Locate a DNA graft to resupply the affected area with fresh DNA. The longer meltdown persists, the more genetic disorders are introduced to the patient's genes.
infotexts.afflictiondescription.thal_tarnishedmelt: The patient's cellular DNA is being corrupted. With cells unable to reproduce. Locate a DNA graft to resupply the affected area with fresh DNA.
infotexts.self_causeofdeathdescription.thal_tarnis: Your DNA has been tarnished, and you have melted into goop.
infotexts.afflictiondescription.thal_mudraptor: The patient's DNA is spliced with that of a mudraptor.
infotexts.afflictiondescription.thal_maggot: The patient's DNA is spliced with that of a Maggot.
infotexts.afflictiondescription.thal_mushroom: The patient's DNA is spliced with that of a Mushroom.
infotexts.afflictiondescription.thal_crawler: The patient's DNA is spliced with that of a Crawler.
infotexts.afflictiondescription.thal_thresher: The patient's DNA is spliced with that of a Thresher.
infotexts.afflictiondescription.thal_hammer: The patient's DNA is spliced with that of a Hammerhead.
infotexts.afflictiondescription.thal_thalamus: The patient's DNA is spliced with that of a Thalamus.
infotexts.afflictiondescription.thal_husk: The patient's DNA is spliced with that of a Husk.
infotexts.entitydescription.thal_disdatfart: An icon representing DNA data for a mutation/syndrome stored on a transplanter. Drag it out of your inventory to delete it.
infotexts.self_causeofdeathdescription.template: Your genetic disorder has killed you.
infotexts.afflictiondescription.thal_disorderexplo: A genetic disorder that causes random igniting explosions when explosives are held. May or may not lead to chain reactions, especially with unstable compounds. \nCan be cured by grafting human DNA.
infotexts.causeofdeathdescription.thal_disorderexp: Killed by an explosive genetic disorder.
infotexts.self_causeofdeathdescription.thal_disord: Your explosive genetic disorder has killed you.
infotexts.afflictiondescription.thal_disorderfart: A genetic disorder that compromises the effectiveness of a patient's intestines. It gets worse when the patient digests food. \nCan be cured by grafting uncorrupted human DNA.
infotexts.afflictiondescription.thal_disorderseizu: A genetic disorder that causes impaired motor control, resulting in lots of tripping. \nCan be cured by grafting uncorrupted human DNA.
infotexts.afflictiondescription.thal_disorderfire: A genetic disorder that ignites random fires near the player when out of water. \nCan be cured by grafting uncorrupted human DNA.
infotexts.afflictiondescription.thal_disorderairlo: A genetic disorder that sucks air out of the room at a rapid pace. \nCan be cured by grafting uncorrupted human DNA.
infotexts.afflictiondescription.thal_disorderbreat: A genetic disorder that makes the patient's lungs unable to breathe oxygen from the air, requiring assisted breathing such as oxygen tanks or gills in water. \nCan be cured by grafting uncorrupted human DNA.
infotexts.afflictiondescription.thal_disorderemp: A genetic disorder that periodically wrecks items damageable by EMP near the player. Becomes lethal in water. \nCan be cured by grafting uncorrupted human DNA.
infotexts.afflictiondescription.thal_disorderhypo: A genetic disorder that results in the patient's skin reacting with extreme sensitivity to cold water. Will gradually freeze and slow down the patient with prolonged exposure. \nCan be cured by grafting uncorrupted human DNA.
infotexts.afflictiondescription.thal_disorderblood: A genetic disorder that drastically increases blood pressure, making bleeding much more lethal. \nCan be cured by grafting uncorrupted human DNA.
infotexts.afflictiondescription.thal_disorderacid: A genetic disorder that makes pores in the client's skin discharge aerosol tear gas that blinds anyone around it. \nCan be cured by grafting uncorrupted human DNA.
infotexts.afflictiondescription.thal_disorderstupi: A genetic disorder that drastically impacts the intelligence and knowledge of the patient, reducing all their skills. \nCan be cured by grafting uncorrupted human DNA.
infotexts.afflictiondescription.thal_disorderweapo: A genetic disorder that gives the patient a crippling fear of weapons. Holding weapons in the hand will gradually make the patient nauseous and experience flashbacks. \nCan be cured by grafting uncorrupted human DNA.
infotexts.afflictiondescription.thal_disorderid: A genetic disorder that 'cuffs' the hands of the patient when an ID card belonging to a security guard, captain, or any similar role of power is in your direct inventory. \nCan be cured by grafting uncorrupted human DNA.
infotexts.afflictiondescription.thal_disorderrad: A skin disorder that makes the skin burn and blister when holding normally harmless radioactive materials, such as ores or fuel rods. \nCan be cured by grafting uncorrupted human DNA.
infotexts.afflictiondescription.thal_disordermumbl: A disorder that makes patient unable to speak when their face is obscured. \nCan be cured by grafting uncorrupted human DNA.
infotexts.afflictiondescription.thal_disorderbait: A disorder that makes the patient blare a Europan mating call in frequencies inaudible to humans. The noise attracts creatures for miles. \nCan be cured by grafting uncorrupted human DNA.
infotexts.afflictiondescription.thal_disorderdeath: A disorder that removes the critical vitality state entirely. Instead of collapsing and going prone, having health fall below zero instantly kills the patient. \nCan be cured by grafting uncorrupted human DNA.
infotexts.afflictiondescription.thal_disorderpress: A disorder that removes the pressure countdown entirely. Being caught in water pressure unprotected instantly kills the patient. \nCan be cured by grafting uncorrupted human DNA.
infotexts.afflictiondescription.thal_disorderthal: A disorder that makes the player deathly afraid of deep waters. Patient slows to a crawl in the depths of the ocean, regardless of protection. \nCan be cured by grafting uncorrupted human DNA.
infotexts.afflictiondescription.thal_disorderbuff: A disorder that makes buffs last for only a fraction of the time they normally do, rendering most of them useless. \nCan be cured by grafting uncorrupted human DNA.
infotexts.afflictiondescription.thal_disorderhusk: A disorder that makes the patient have a low chance of randomly gaining husk infection at full health. Try to stay hurt if you can. \nCan be cured by grafting uncorrupted human DNA.
infotexts.entitydescription.thal_dnascanner: 一种从生物唾液中收集DNA的DNA扫描仪。 不会对死亡生物起作用。 可以接线。
infotexts.scannerinfo.ready: Scanner Ready - Insert Conscious Specimen Into Beam
infotexts.entitydescription.thal_dnabox: A handheld cryogenic cooler designed to store and preserve DNA without degradation. In the event of the cooler being lost, DNA can also be preserved by submerging it in water.
infotexts.entitydescription.thal_dnahatcher: 使用DNA中创造生物的豆荚。 放入肉直到所需生物有足够的生物量，然后插入其DNA并按开始以形成并培育胚胎。
infotexts.entitydescription.thal_dnahuman: 标准智人的完整遗传序列。 可用于开发抗类人动物技术，或用于可以让人类恢复正常的DNA嫁接器。
infotexts.entitydescription.thal_dnamudraptor: 标准迅猛龙的完整遗传序列。 可用于开发抗迅猛龙技术，或用于DNA嫁接进行基因剪接。
infotexts.entitydescription.thal_dnacrawler: 标准爬行者的完整遗传序列。 可用于开发抗爬行者技术，或用于DNA嫁接进行基因剪接。
infotexts.entitydescription.thal_dnamaggot: 标准蛆虫的完整遗传序列。 可用于开发抗蛆虫技术，或用于DNA嫁接器进行基因剪接。
infotexts.entitydescription.thal_dnaramblin: 蘑菇的完整基因序列。 可用于开发抗蘑菇技术，或用于DNA嫁接器进行基因剪接。
infotexts.entitydescription.thal_dnahusk:
Decays when not stored in water or a cryogenic container. Corrupts when fully broken.

 Complete genetic sequence of the standard Europan Husk. Can be used to develop anti-Husk technologies, or in DNA grafts for gene splicing. DNA Abilities by Grafts: 
Head (Bite): Able to infect any creature with a single bite. 
Torso (Scent Glands): Gains the ability to not be detected by husks. 
Limbs (Egg Sac): Once per mission you can scrape off the built up eggs on your body.
infotexts.entitydescription.thal_planter: 一种先进的花箱，旨在改善植物学家所需的科学测量和植物指标分析。 使业余爱好者的园丁和真正的科学家有所不同。
infotexts.entitydescription.thal_geneticsign: 可以放置在地板上或附着在墙壁上的标志，以指示从DNA电离辐射到基因操纵化学物质的地质灾害区域。
infotexts.entitydescription.thal_geneticistsuit: 轻型套装，设计用于轻度放射性环境。 轻度抵抗辐射和遗传损害的机会。
infotexts.entitydescription.thal_enforcerhelmet: A modified diving mask combined with a helmet. Offers improved head protection combined with the functionality of a diving mask.
infotexts.entitydescription.thal_glowsaber: 极其强大的能量剑，可造成较大的燃烧伤害，并能够穿透墙壁和门。 它的燃料来源是用反物质传播剂产生的奇异“发光水晶”。
infotexts.entitydescription.thal_glowcrystal: 一种用于各种大功率能源武器的结晶弹药源。 稀有物品，请明智地使用。
infotexts.entitydescription.thal_frostcrystal: 用于各种大功率能源武器的低于零摄氏度的晶体弹药源。 它的冷芯使其变蓝色。 稀有物品，请明智地使用。
infotexts.entitydescription.thal_synthcrystal: 一种合成的晶体弹药源，用于各种大功率能源武器。 它的人造性质使其具有红色调。 极少，请明智使用。
infotexts.entitydescription.thal_tripmine: 在生物范围内激活的激光。 地雷离躯干越近，触发效果越好。
infotexts.entitydescription.thal_bombcollar: 极其危险的可穿戴物品。 一旦佩戴并开启了，在不解除爆炸物的情况下卸下项圈，就会导致致命的爆炸。 可以通过解除爆炸物工具禁用。
infotexts.entitydescription.thal_bombcollartimed: 定时炸弹项圈的一种特别难缠的项圈，在使用状态不会爆炸，而是倒计时结束后爆炸。 尽快使用解除爆炸物工具！
infotexts.entitydescription.thal_bombcollarkey: 拖到项圈上以解除武装。
infotexts.entitydescription.thal_bombvest: 背心装有多种高爆炸药，一旦使用者死亡，炸药就会爆炸。 大概会让某人杀死你时三思而后行。
infotexts.entitydescription.thal_nukevest: 背心装有各种放射性物质，会在使用者死亡时引起核爆炸。 爆炸并不会造成多么严重的物理伤害，但会留下致命的放射性尘埃。
infotexts.entitydescription.trirailgunloader: Designed to efficiently load three rounds of railgun ammunition into a linked railgun system.
infotexts.entitydescription.grapplingturret: 联盟工业采矿激光器，旨在摧毁岩石和收获矿物。 在切穿墙壁方面特别有效，但其设计目的是不伤害生物。
infotexts.entitydescription.grapplingturretloader: 用于将氧气加载到切割激光器中。
infotexts.entitydescription.grapplingturretbeam: 采矿激光射击的弹丸。 显然，你真的很不错！
infotexts.entitydescription.grapplingturretammobox: 等离子发电包由起爆剂和大量的含氧化合物组成。 用于重型切割操作，例如采矿激光和切割器包装。 非常贵！
infotexts.entitydescription.carvinglaser: 联盟工业采矿激光器，旨在摧毁岩石和收获矿物。 在切穿墙壁方面特别有效，但其设计目的是不伤害生物。
infotexts.entitydescription.carvinglaserloader: 用于将氧气加载到切割激光器中。
infotexts.entitydescription.carvinglaserbeam: 采矿激光射击的弹丸。 显然，你真的很不错！
infotexts.entitydescription.carvinglaserammobox: 等离子发电包由起爆剂和大量的含氧化合物组成。 用于重型切割操作，例如采矿激光和切割器包装。 非常贵！
infotexts.entitydescription.emcannon: 叛徒发明的定向能量武器，能够定向发射脉冲，会造成轻微的灼伤，但重要的是会破坏电气设备或机械设备。 巨大而耀眼的弹丸可能会引起听众和观看者的注意。
infotexts.entitydescription.thal_apc: Device serving as a junction box with a built-in circuit breaker that also maintains a charge like a battery. Intended for power control interface for a single room; A "player-friendly" relay with minor backup power to keep the lights on for a little longer once external power goes out. Can be manually loaded with batteries to recharge.
infotexts.entitydescription.thal_locator: A radio that detects acoustic transmissions through water. Can be used to listen in on communications in nearby areas to give your crew sidequests.
infotexts.transmission.cache.1: The local AHAM Radio has intercepted an unencrypted Coalition-signed transmission from a search drone to a map server. Analytics suggest it is heading towards a wildlife research wreck. If you choose to take the cache for yourself, the Coalition will not know it was you.\n[The location of the cache has been marked on the sonar.]
infotexts.transmission.cache.2: The on-ship AHAM Radio has deciphered a distress signal from a nearby cargo ship carrying a significant surplus of equipment. Public shipment records indicate the ship was thought to be lost years ago and was effectively forgotten. If you choose to salvage the cache for yourself, nobody will know. \n[The location of the cache has been marked on the sonar.]
infotexts.transmission.cache.3: The onboard AHAM Radio has intercepted a series of standby transmissions in the nearby area. Status reports reveal that the ship was an independent mercenary attack sub, and all life support systems are dead, citing an attack by monsters. If you can clear the monsters, the guns would be yours.\n[The location of the cache has been marked on the sonar.]
infotexts.transmission.cache.4: A local AHAM Radio has intercepted a residual frequency from a nearby data cube containing instructions to a "hidden treasure trove". The source is unidentified, and the transmission is unsigned. If you choose to investigate, it may be a trap, so come armed.\n[The location of the cache has been marked on the sonar.]
infotexts.entitydescription.thal_lootcrate: An Abandoned Beacon Crate, found lost amidst the wreckage. Finders, keepers.
infotexts.buttonautolimit: Auto Limit Output on Backup Low
infotexts.entitydescription.radbeam: 光束辐射发射器能够对活生物体造成严重灼伤，但对其他所有物体完全无效。
infotexts.entitydescription.radbeamloader: Used for loading fuel rods into Radiation Beam.
infotexts.entitydescription.piano: An expensive Grandwin and Sons Piano. The music is only as good as the pianist. Place away from reactors, vents, sides of the ship, and other noisemakers for best results!
infotexts.entityname.thal_guidegen_index:
@INDEX

Below is a table of contents giving a brief summary of each page:

-SCANNER: How to obtain DNA via Scanner
-DNA: Proper DNA Handling, Corruption
-SPLICING: How to splice DNA to apply grafts
-KNOWN GRAFTS: Database of known grafts
-MUTATIONS: Rundown of Disorders/Mutations
-TRANSPLANT: Transplanting, Isolating Mutations
-CLONING: Biomass, Cloning for Fresh DNA
infotexts.entityname.thal_guidegen_scanner:
@SCANNING

Every geneticist starts with a scanner to obtain DNA by scanning creatures. DNA is the backbone of genetics.
You can hold right mouse button to aim, and press E or Left-Mouse to attach your scanner to a wall. Attached, you can interact with the scanner to turn it on and off. The emitted beam is hazardous and will have slow but deadly effects on people around it left on for too long. It will also break down quickly while active, so use sparingly. To detach the scanner, use a wrench. You can also wire the scanner in order to operate remotely with signals.
To obtain DNA, a *LIVING* creature must stand under the beam of a scanner for ~30 seconds. The progress of the scan can be seen on the scanner in the form of a progress bar that gradually fills during scanning. If a creature exits the beam, the bar will deplete quickly: maintain its position by any means necessary.
The Institute recommends that scientists use Paralyzant in order to keep the creature alive but motionless. Robust scientists, however, have been known to use other tricks to avoid wasting Paralyzant. Remember that safety of the crew comes first!
Once the bar is full, a fresh fragment of DNA will drop out of the scanner. Put it in your cooler ASAP.
infotexts.entityname.thal_guidegen_splice:
@SPLICING

DNA can be spliced with the DNA of you or your crewmembers to gain new abilities.
DNA can be grafted to three types of target slots: The "Head", the "Torso", and the "Limbs". Each graft has a different effect depending on the slot and the DNA used. Each slot can only have one mutation; Splicing to a slot will revert any existing grafts there.
Anything grafted to the head slot is an active ability, meaning you can press "Creature Attack" (middle mouse by default) to use it.
CRISPR-Cas9 is an intracellular solution that prepares the subject's DNA for grafts. It is consumed in one use, making it precious, and equivalent to one graft in worth.
To use CRISPR, equip it. The Health menu must be closed, or it won't equip. You will see three buttons onscreen. Click one depending on your desired slot. Inject it into whoever you want spliced. They will now enter "meltdown": they are ready for the graft.
Next, put your DNA in the DNA Grafter. Be quick to minimize DNA corruption. Inject the grafter into the person undergoing meltdown. They should collapse and get up shortly with a new ability. Congrats!
When humans with grafts die, their DNA collapses and they melt. Revival, organ harvesting, and other things dependent on corpses won't work.
infotexts.entityname.thal_guidegen_grafts:
@KNOWN GRAFTS

Below is a list of known grafts discovered by The Institute so far. You can see all 3 slot grafts of a DNA and what they do in the DNA sample's mouseover description. It's up to Europan geneticists to find the rest!

MUDRAPTOR-LIMBS
Tail that increases swim speed.
CRAWLER-TORSO
Gills that provide air in water.
MUSHROOM-TORSO
Pores that regenerate health in spore clouds.
MAGGOT-HEAD
Launches user at a structure/entity on use.
THRESHER-TORSO
Shell immune to pressure up to 4000m.
HAMMERHEAD-HEAD
Head ridge that sends other creatures flying.

Can YOU research all 21 grafts? Better get scanning!
infotexts.entityname.thal_guidegen_mutation:
@MUTATIONS

MUTATIONS are a side effect of genetic malpractice. The Institute strongly discourages the use of mutations on the general public but encourages controlled research on test subjects to study and catalogue mutations. There are 30 mutations in all.
When CORRUPT DNA is grafted, a random number of mutations (anywhere from 1-7) may emerge in the patient alongside the usual graft. Mutations consist of two types: DISORDERS and MutationS. DISORDERS are mostly harmful, while MutationS are beneficial. Disorders are indicated by a FUCHSIA PINK icon where afflictions are normally shown, and Mutations are indicated by a YELLOW-GREEN. The specific mutations you get from corrupted DNA are essentially luck: Initially, you must "roll" for your desired mutations.
All mutations will be reverted if you graft human DNA. This is an effective way of curing all disorders in an emergency or after accidentally using corrupted DNA.
infotexts.entityname.thal_guidegen_transplant:
@TRANSPLANTING

To reduce randomness, an item exists to "hold" selected mutations from the draw.
The DNA Transplanter copies, edits, and transfers mutations. Injecting someone with an empty DNA Transplanter will store their mutations if they have any. A sound and a binary effect will occur if the storing is successful, and the stored afflictions will be listed in the mouseover description. Afterward, injecting anyone with the same transplanter will give them all of the stored mutations. Depending on the severity of the mutations, the condition of the transplanter will decrease. More dangerous or beneficial mutations (such as Mutations) typically decrease the condition faster. When the condition reaches zero, the transplanter and its contents are destroyed. This serves as a way to transfer mutations from one person to another, but only a limited number of times.
The transfer can also remove certain traits. Equipping the transplanter and pressing "Cull Mutations" allows the contents of the transplanter to be viewed on mouseover, similar to a diving mask or a toolbelt. From here, you can isolate any unwanted mutations in the transplanter. Pressing "Cull Mutations" reduces the transplanter to one use, but you can plant your culled mutations onto a clean subject, and then use a fresh transplanter to scan from said subject.
infotexts.entityname.thal_guidegen_clone:
@CLONING

In case your DNA degrades or corrupts, there's a method to retrieve fresh DNA from the corrupted sample through cloning, enabling you to obtain uncorrupted DNA from the original creature.
To clone, hold your Biomorphic Incubation Pod in your hands, aim with the right mouse button, and press E or the left mouse button to attach it. Dropping it on the ground will not work. When properly attached, the Incubator will display the amount of "biomass" it contains. Each creature requires a different amount of biomass, with humans requiring 60kg.
Biomass (organic material) can be obtained by placing fleshy organs from creatures inside the incubator. Geneticists spawn with a Meat Cleaver allowing them to carve meat from corpses to gain biomass. Repeatedly hit corpses until blood gushes everywhere and entrails come out.
Once enough biomass is obtained, interact with the Incubator. You will see a single item slot and an initiation button. Place the biomass in the item slot, and it should instantly grind while the counter goes up. Once enough biomass is present, insert the DNA of the desired creature and initiate cloning. You should then be able to scan the creature to obtain uncorrupted DNA.

Congratulations on completing the guide! If you're truly a genetics pro, you can deconstruct this book for a free set of genetics tools.
infotexts.entityname.thal_necro_description: Book detailing the basics of the cultist role. Hold to read, type in the topmost bar to navigate.
infotexts.entityname.thal_necro_intro:
---WELCOME---
Welcome to the Abridged Necronomicon!

This book is for cultists who don't have time to read the long, boring Necronomicon, teaching you the basics of occultism like summoning scary stuff, communicating with the dead, and the fundamentals of blood rituals!

This electronic book is navigated by entering terms into the topmost box. Press 'index' to view available terms.
infotexts.entityname.thal_necro_index:
---INDEX---
Here is an index of available terms followed by what their pages are:
glassaltar: directions for using the blood altar to obtain items
pentagram: basic usage of the summoning pentagram
coldcavern: ritual directions for summoning the 'Cold Cavern Sampler'
glow: ritual directions for summoning the 'Glowpocalypse'
: ritual directions for summoning the 'Calyx Outbreak'.
infotexts.entityname.thal_necro_glassaltar:
---GLASS ALTAR + GUTTER DAGGER---
Congratulations on your purchase of a Honkcraftian altar and dagger combo! These items serve to aid in collecting blood and summoning items.

Your GUTTER DAGGER has a bar indicating how much blood it has collected. Stab things to collect blood! While you may be tempted to stab your colleagues, remember that Euopan creatures provide more blood overall. Only draw blood from human subjects with their consent.

Your GLASS ALTAR is where blood can be redeemed for special items via blood rituals. Place your GUTTER DAGGER inside the altar, and equip the altar in your hand to see the options. You must have the indicated amount of blood in the dagger or the ritual will not work! Wait for the ritual to finish, and your item will appear inside the altar, allowing removal.
infotexts.entityname.thal_necro_pentagram:
---SUMMONING PENTAGRAM---
If you want to bring forsaken life into the world, look no further than your SUMMONING PENTAGRAM.

You can create a summoning pentagram with your GLASS ALTAR provided you have enough blood (refer to section 'glassaltar'). Equip it, aim with the right mouse button, and place it with your USE key (E or left mouse). Once your pentagram is laid out, it cannot be removed nondestructively!

You can now SUMMON CREATURES. Various SUMMONING ITEMS in the game can be placed in your pentagram to initiate a ritual, and they will also spawn some LOOT, provided you don't mind a little bit of fighting! Refer to these sections to learn about a few basic summons!
coldcavern: ritual directions for summoning the 'Cold Cavern Sampler'
glow: ritual directions for summoning the 'Glowpocalypse'
husk: ritual directions for summoning the 'Calyx Outbreak'
...and many more! Experiment with items closely associated with living creatures (e.g., husk stingers for husks, paralyzant for thalamus, etc).
infotexts.entityname.thal_necro_coldcavern:
---RITUAL: COLD CAVERN SAMPLER---
Summoning Item: Mudraptor Shell
Summons Per Item: 2
Time Required: 45 seconds
Successful Outcome: 3 Hydrophixate, 1 Stantium, 2 Crawlers
Chance of Failure: 5%
Failure Outcome: Pentagram Destroyed, 3 Mudraptors, 1 Crawler

An ideal summon for newbie cultists of underarmed ships. The low risks, easily obtainable item, and pushover success enemies make it a reliable source of basic resources.
infotexts.entityname.thal_necro_husk:
---RITUAL: CALYX OUTBREAK---
Summoning Item: Husk Stinger
Summons Per Item: 3
Time Required: 60 seconds
Successful Outcome: 1 Calyxanide, 1 Husk Eggs, 2 Husks
Chance of Failure: 15%
Failure Outcome: Pentagram Destroyed, 1 Husked Crawler, 2 Husks, 1 Husk Eggs

Few enemies summoned ensure that smaller crews will be less overwhelmed, but being caught off guard by a failure may easily result in a husk outbreak among the crew. Stay vigilant with this one, and you will find yourself with plenty of calyxanide.
infotexts.entityname.thal_necro_glow:
---RITUAL: GLOWPOCALYPSE---
Summoning Item: Glow/Synth/Frost Crystal
Summons Per Item: 3
Time Required: 40 seconds
Successful Outcome: 2 Uranium, 1 Thorium, 1 Glowraptor
Chance of Failure: 30%
Failure Outcome: Pentagram Destroyed, Small Nuclear Explosion, 3 Glowraptors

A somewhat risky gamble with an alluring payoff of lots of fuel for the reactor. It is recommended that your crew has the firepower to back up this venture.
infotexts.necro.welcome:
The Abridged Necronomicon

Hubismal and Sons Publishing

Copyright 2036

Type 'intro' into the topmost box and then press Enter to begin.
infotexts.thal_timedcollar_traitorobjectivestartme: Now that your crew has settled into the ship, you might finally have a chance to make some easy cash at long last. First thing's first:\n[traitorgoalinfos]
infotexts.thal_timedcollar_goalinfotext_1: In the [targethullname], check the cabinets. You can see the room names on a Status Monitor or an Automap.
infotexts.thal_timedcollar_objectivefailmessage1: Welp. You couldn't even manage to get the collar somehow, and that's probably the end of your payment opportunity. Guess it's back to the classifieds of The Europan.
infotexts.thal_timedcollar_objectivesuccessmessage: This is it. A weapons dealer "commissioned" you to try this on a live subject. You'd hate to have one of these strapped around your neck, and normally you'd hate to do the strapping, but you need the credits.
infotexts.thal_timedcollar_traitorobjectivestartme: Careful not to use it on accident. Now, you'll need a diversion for everyone to occupy themselves with while you find a subject.\n[traitorgoalinfos]
infotexts.thal_timedcollar_goalinfotext_2: Sabotage the engine. It needs to be disabled to distract the attention of the others.
infotexts.thal_timedcollar_objectivefailmessage2: So much for disabling the engine. Without a proper distraction, this mission has already failed.
infotexts.thal_timedcollar_objectivesuccessmessage: Nice. That'll slow the ship down and get heads turning.
infotexts.thal_timedcollar_traitorobjectivestartme: It's showtime! Your contractor spent hours searching for a test subject who would not be missed. Now their fate has arrived.\n[traitorgoalinfos]
infotexts.thal_timedcollar_goalinfotext_3: Knock out [targetname] somehow and strap the collar onto their head. Survive and evade detainment during the countdown, and see the collar to its detonation!
infotexts.thal_timedcollar_objectivefailmessage3: Shit! Almost. Your contractor wanted the collar to kill the subject alive and nothing else. Unfortunately, you'll have to find work elsewhere, maybe in a restaurant or something, because this mission just flopped.
infotexts.thal_timedcollar_objectivesuccessmessage: Holy shit! They're fucking dead. Obviously. Okay, don't panic, you need to get the hell out of here!
infotexts.thal_timedcollar_traitorobjectivestartme: You need to escape before things get worse. The operative said you'd be picked up, and you can't afford to stay on this ship any longer!\n[traitorgoalinfos]
infotexts.thal_timedcollar_goalinfotext_4: Put a distance of 200 meters between yourself and the sub, whether through shuttle or underwater scooter.
infotexts.thal_timedcollar_objectivefailmessage4: Oops. That did not work out the way you were expecting it to at all.
infotexts.thal_timedcollar_objectivesuccessmessage: That should be far enough. You see what looks like a well armed military shuttle in the distance and hail to them. They slow to pick you up. Here comes the money!
infotexts.entitydescription.thal_mimecase: It's a sophisticated miniature leather briefcase. NOT a purse. Advanced mime trickery allows it to carry unusually large objects. Only openable by the mime.
infotexts.entitydescription.thal_mimeberet: French head garment and standard mimewear. Silly but sophisticated.
infotexts.entitydescription.thal_mimecostume: A more subtle costume for a more refined entertainment. When worn by a mime, it increases agility.
infotexts.entitydescription.thal_invisiblewall: Only usable by the mime. Can be used to shove people around, and even defend against bullets. Similar to the mudraptor shell.
infotexts.entitydescription.thal_mimespray: An industry-grade spray that silences people for a limited amount of time. Only usable by mimes.
infotexts.entitydescription.thal_vent: Place this vent and hide within it.
infotexts.talentdescription.thal_botanysuit: Welcome, researcher. It's time to get suited up.
infotexts.talentdescription.thal_geneharvester: When looting a creature, there is a [probability]% chance of finding a [itemname] on it.
infotexts.talentdescription.thal_geneformulation: After months of research, you can now extract DNA from living creatures.
infotexts.talentdescription.thal_blackmarketgenes: Shops in Research Stations and Cities can sell [itemname].
infotexts.talentdescription.thal_deathbycomedy: Upon death, the bearer violently explodes, potentially harming anything in close proximity, be it crew or otherwise.
infotexts.talentdescription.indoctrination: Upon completing each mission while wearing the [cultist] or [zealot] attire, you earn [reputation] reputation for [faction].
infotexts.talentdescription.spreadtheword: You gain the ability to sculpt husk art pieces. Worshiping these statues grants you [affliction].
infotexts.talentdescription.devoutest: Your body has adapted to withstand Europa's harshest conditions; you no longer require oxygen to breathe and are immune to environmental pressures.
infotexts.talentdescription.preacher: You are now tasked with spreading the word of the [faction] and its goals.
infotexts.entitydescription.thal_geneticmaterial_u: This DNA has not been researched enough to determine its origin.
infotexts.entitydescription.thal_seedmodder: This device facilitates the hybridization of seeds from various Europan fauna, enabling the cultivation of plants previously unsuitable for submarine environments. It also allows for the creation of entirely new plant species through genetic recombination.
infotexts.entitydescription.thal_radsuit: An advanced suit primarily utilized by scientists for handling highly radioactive materials. While it does not offer protection against pressure or suffocation, it provides near-immunity to burns, radiation, and glowing.
infotexts.entitydescription.thal_botanyradsuit: An advanced suit primarily worn by botanists when dealing with volatile fauna. Although it does not safeguard against pressure or suffocation, it grants immunity to the effects of hazardous plant life.
